topic.title: Port Forwarding 15441
topic.body: I can't seem to get this port forwarded even though I've forwarded it every way I know possible to do so.

topic.title: JavaScript
topic.body: Does anyone know how to make JavaScript work on a ZeroNet site?

2_1BDapygZHNG8GxEuSsEpK9Xipm9mFfW1F2.body: I just cloned a site to make it available on ZeroNet and it already had the JavaScript coded into it
Download here is the JavaScript button code that doesn't work anyone know how to make it work?
it works fine outside of ZeroNet
it works locally outside of zeronet but just not within zeronet for some reason
